entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:37 a.m. EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High zero. POP 30%
